data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Kisii, Kenya from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kisii, Kenya
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 571,589 believers in Kisii and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Kisii, Kenya to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kisii that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Sindhi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Kisii, Kenya not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Kisii, Kenya.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 571,589 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Kisii.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Kisii
location.people_groups_list: Orma, Oromo, Sakuye, Arab, Hadrami, Arab, Yemeni, Gujarati Creole
